name: gridy
description: TypeScript grid library for server and browser
author: Jan Forst <ensonador@gmail.com>

scripts.build: del-cli dist && tsc -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6 && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/index.js -o dist/gridy.js -f umd -n Gridy && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/Diagram.js -o dist/diagram.js -f umd -n Diagram
scripts.dist: del-cli dist && tsc -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6 && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/index.js -o dist/gridy.js -f umd -n Gridy && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/Diagram.js -o dist/diagram.js -f umd -n Diagram && uglifyjs dist/diagram.js > dist/diagram.min.js && uglifyjs dist/gridy.js > dist/gridy.min.js
scripts.doc: del-cli doc && typedoc --hideGenerator --mode file --out doc src/ --name Gridy --readme .template.md
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently --raw --kill-others "tsc --watch -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6" "rollup dist/es6/index.js -w --o dist/gridy.js --f umd --name Gridy" "rollup dist/es6/Diagram.js -w --o dist/diagram.js --f umd --name Diagram"
